resources.string: Y U DO DIS TO ME?
I will Show you around a bit

CITTIC(Centre for Innovation Technology Transfer and Industrial Collaboration) is an organization
under CUSAT which has been designed with the purpose of enhancing the bonding between
industries and students and making them more familiar with entrepreneur world.\n It aims at guiding
and motivating the students to involve in innovation at the University which is capable of solving the
needs of the industries.\nIn an attempt to promote the entrepreneurship culture within the CUSAT
premises, the Technology Business Incubator(TBI) of CUSAT which is managed by CITTIC itself has
already started incubating startup companies with students as entrepreneurs.

Cusatxpress is the Official Campus blog of CUSAT, founded on 14 November 2009 by two Students of Civil Engineering Department SOE CUSAT.After a year on the service it got the Official Campus blog title for its services. Mission of CusatXpress is to serve the needy with useful information and Resources about CUSAT.
